name: Notice.AAA6.CP.Case.Stayed.Claimant
titleCy: Mae’r achos wedi cael ei atal
descriptionEn: The case has been stayed. This could be as a result of a judge’s order. Any upcoming hearings will be cancelled.
descriptionCy: Mae’r achos wedi’i atal. Gallai hyn fod o ganlyniad i orchymyn a waned gan farnwr. Bydd unrhyw wrandawiadau sydd i ddod yn cael eu canslo.
